Pros:clean private pool but not all the room. the view is amazing location also is good stuff are friendly.
Pros:Everything was amazing

Booked the deluxe ocean view room, and the view did not disappoint! Our room (SE173) was quite low, which meant easy walkable access to the restaurant, big pool and beach. Also it means we had a beautiful oceanfront view, instead of a view of roofs for the higher bay rooms. Initially a bit upset with the hospitality, as I emailed them multiple times regarding a private dinner booking before getting a reply. After which it takes on average two follow up emails across the week to extract the next reply from them. The front office receptionists were very helpful and friendly. Both electronic locks on our doors were not functioning (please remember to check), and they quickly sent over a staff to fix it. It took quite a bit of time to fix. One of the nights we ordered grab delivery, but we waited over half an hour after the front desk called to tell me food has arrived. Turns out the staff came and rang the bell, we did not come to the door, left, and the front office called our room. In quite an impolite tone questioned us if we were in our room and told us off for not opening the door. We were very confused as we have been waiting all along in the room by the door, but never heard anything. Turns out the bell is not working as well. A big upset we were accused wrongly when it was their faulty doorbell. Not anyone’s fault but the attitude could be better. After reflecting these issues to the front office, they were very quick to send a staff to check the bell as well as to address our concerns.
Pros:Staff are amazing
This is the place where you can enjoy the tropical atmosphere.
Pros:Villa spacious, great private pool Beautiful beach Great restaurant, and staff
Great place

Pros: Great private beach area, right next to a garden with beach beds and pool area. Villa / private pool / facilities / staff - all excellent Cons: Highly recommend having your own transport if you wish to move through Phuket. Villa and restaurants will need slight update in the coming years to maintain the luxurious feel
Pros:Idyllic location and rooms. Very helpful staff always willing to go above and beyond.

We stayed in the hotel 1x1 Bedroom Signature Higher Bay Pool Villa. It was the most amazing stay. The views were breathtaking and all the staff was extremely helpful and friendly. I would definitely recommend the Naka Phuket and I can’t wait to return.

Pros:Every thing was amazing the villa was perfect the hotel fully of happiness by the view. The staff was so kindly and respectful with me and i got a problem with the reservation date they fixed it

Pros:The hospitality of hotel is great. Staff named “NIL”, hope I didn’t miss spell her name , was great. She even remember what we’ll order for breakfast drink the next morning. She has a good memory. My daughter ran around and fell which caused her left knee has abrasion. We didn’t ask for help. However, the driver from the buggy noticed it and proactively helped us for the first aid Kit from reception, which was so heartwarming. We liked the pool besides the restaurant which is so relaxing, facing the beach. Overall it is a great experience.
Pros:Location

Pros:All the staff and the management are really polite and kind and helpful. The service is good. It's a delight to come back to your hotel, tired and weary and being greeted by those smiling faces ready to assist you with anything you need.
This was the best stay ever. One of the great places with great room and view. We really enjoyed and had fun. Staff was good, room was great with a view

Pros:Breathtaking, Amazing, Spectacular The staff were very friendly and they treat you like a royal member. They prepared breakfast boxes for us at checkout because our flight was too early in the morning, i loved this, i never saw this in any other hotel. The view is AMAAAZING. The rooms are very clean. Don’t worry about insects and lizards inside the rooms. Try the SPA it’s worth the money. One important note for those who want full privacy: swimming pools might not be with full privacy, it’s open to other villas, but my room (high bay signature) had full privacy at the top of the bay no one can see my pool however I can see other villas and swimming pools. The rooms are fully surrounded with glass doors with no walls but it’s covered with curtains, it’s amazing but not to those who want full privacy. You can close the curtains but keep in mind if you opened it everyone can see inside your room. It’s a bit isolated so it’s suitable for those who really want to RELAX

Another thing is that the private beach infront of the hotel is really rocky, you are not able to swim in it. So its only good to watch and listen the waves. Service and staff were really good and attentive. Breakfast had a wide variety but just so so.

Pros: The units which has private pool are spacious and well-maintained. Mini-bar beverages are complementary. Spa treatments was a heaven with reasonable rates, Sky Lounge was definitely a plus to the resort facilities. The Wiwa restaurants was excellent choice for breakfast and in-room dining with reasonable prices and a variety of options. Cons:, The room rate is over proced. I was assigned to Villa 15/3 with partial sea view (only available at the time) however, I couldn’t see the sea at all from Villa, the view was covered by trees. I requested secluded pool (privacy for Muslim ladies), yet, the Villa behind us ; (actually on top of us in the hill) exposed the whole pool. My wife couldn’t enjoy swimming as planned and expected. Nevertheless, we tried to enjoy our stay, but I would think twice before reserving again in the same resort. It won’t completely fit conservative families.

The hotel is massive and the rooms are amazing. this is the place to be if you truly want to just relax. The hotel rooms were awesome, and getting there was simple with the hotel rides- never waited more than 1 minute to get a car. Only issue was that there should be more signs and lights near the stairways to get around - first 2 days we were kind of lost walking around (it's A LOT of steps). Also GRAB is your best friend - pick up and drop off to the hotel was pretty simple (just dark and hilly on the way to the hotel). Overall pretty awesome place! Everything in the city was about a 12-15 minute ride!
Good service but the privacy from villa to villa is not provided good enough. We can see other villa from our room.

Everything was just perfect; the facility, location, private beach, kids club, pool, and food was amazing; and up to our expectations. We had the 3 bedrooms signature pool villa, the view is wonderful and rooms are spacious and clean. The only comments I have is on the room furniture as it’s a bit old and need to renovated; I have seen some rooms undergoing renovation during our stay. Another note about the rooms; each room is located on a different floor; It wasn’t convenient as I was traveling with young kids. The staff was super nice, and cooperative I would definitely visit the facility again when come to Phuket; I wish they finish the renovation soon

Upon arrival the hotel did not have our reservation ready, so we had to waited almost an hour. Services were great but also inconsistency. The room was spacious and offers great views with plush comfortable bed and well appointed amenities. Private beach offers great privacy but rocky and quite difficult to swim without beach shoes. Some facilities were missing. Overall the property did not meet our expectations and we'd rather stay somewhere else next time.

I would give this hotel a 5/5. The pros are large rooms (high bay villa) very private, secluded beach, decent food, great views from the rooms and excellent service. They could probably do with one more restaurant. Make sure the AC is working in your room. But overall a grear stay, good location, excellent service wity large spacious pool rooms with privacy.

Pros:The spaciousness, the size of the rooms , and the most comfortable bed! Beautiful grounds and the transport system with the tuk tuks is really quick and convenient, we never waited. Truly wonderful staff, super helpful. Best room service burger I’ve ever had!
Pros:The rooms are well designed and located on the slope overlooking a bay. The atmosphere is very relaxing. The staff are nice and friendly.

Pros:the staff were fantastic. If you need to go anywhere, ask for Mr Dong. He speaks English better than most & is really helpful & not expensive. Look after him & you he will definitely look after you

Wonderful staff, super gracious and always willing to help and serve. Beautiful rooms, good food and close to Patong only 10 min cab ride which was readily available in the lobby. Daily Breakfast buffet was amazing with many option and staff was super serving. Would def come back. Only negative is the WiFi strength in the facility.
Room was nice and cosy, food was excellent, staff where helpful and friendly. Room pool was clean, main pool had amazing view of the sea and snorkelling was fun
Pros:The breakfest was very tasty
Pros:Property was beautiful!
Pros:relax good breakfast very nice view and quiet clean

I had an opportunity to stay here during covid outbreak. It was fabulous back then. The staff were friendly and attentive. The facilities were clean and spectacular. Hence I went again. However, during this stay, the opposite happened. Maybe it was full capacity hence the staff were not enough to manage the hilly facilities. The cleanliness were not up to standard. The welcome fruits were not served. To summarise, do stay during a promotion but not during high season with full price.
It is recommended to have peaceful place and enjoy the private pool. Should place small sign inside the villa to notify residences that all stuff inside the villa should not be taken
Very rocky beach, couldn’t swim in the beach and worth breakfast ever. Didn’t have air con for 12 hours in such hot weather and I told hotel manager to inform Agoda, but they didn’t do any thing.
Pros:Special thanks to the hotel staff, who were very professional and very polite at all times. They arranged everything we needed. (transportation, amenities, late check-out, ...)
Real great resort and stuff i enjoy there
Pros:The rooms are huge ! Each room have his own private pool! Breakfast was fine The hotel area is really beautiful
Pros:The view, room, pool

Heard a lot good comments about the resort for the unique design and also the nice view to the sea and of course it was amazing as expected! However valuing with the money that we have paid and for the food standard for Phuket Resort, I think the hotel restaurant was a bit of downfall for our stay! We arrived the resort around noon and because our room was not ready yet, we went for lunch in the restaurant. Since it has been 3 years since our last visit to Thailand, opting for Thai food was a must at the time with all those craves! So we ordered a chicken satay, a seafood fried rice and baffalo wings. All these dishes are like the basics yet the chicken quality of the satay was quite hard to chew with no tenderness, the fried rice had very plain taste and at some point we thought maybe the chef forgot to add in salt or other essential ingredients. For the first night dinner we stayed in the hotel and thought we would give it another try for their western food so that time we order a Tom Yum soup, Spaghetti Aglio and Angus beef steak. The spaghetti was way to spicy for Aglio style and the Tom Yum was a bit plain for the Tom Yum. Once again the taste seems to be at different dishes unexpectedly. During our stay in Phuket the weather was soooo good and everyone opted out for the sun on the beach and swimming pool. There was one day it was so crowded and there were no vacancy for the sunbathing chair. We searched and waited for sometime till we found two large beanbags that was left lying around and no staff actually attended us at all. Then the next day we decided to get the sunbathing chairs earlier and make sure we had a spot so we went to the pool before breakfast at 9.30. Overall it was a peaceful stay however we expected for more attentive hospitality and outstanding catering.
Pros:Amazing

Pros:Private beach and private infinity pool inside the villa. Dining and breakfast quality. Olympic size infinity pool. Stunning views of the ocean. Free transportation service inside the hotel. Very kind and helpful staff. Contemporary designed rooms and facilities.

A fantastic hotel that absolutely fulfilled our expectations and wishes! Not cheap - but if you are looking for a special place to stay with a great private villa, beautiful beach, sea view and lots of privacy, this is it. We had a wonderful stay for a special event and enjoyed every minute!
Pros:I loved the staff they were really nice to us.
Excellent Location Friendly Staff Fabulous View It's a must try hotel

Pros:+private pool +villa ocean view +friendly and helpful stuff +luxury sense +activities with no extra fee (gym classes, water sports) +whatever u ask for it's done on time +arranged private event, romantic dinner on the beach with great fine dining options and decoration +great decorations and design +yoga and Thai chi classes with a great view

There were no insect screens in the accommodation I stayed in. So I had a rough night because of the mosquitoes. Also, the pictures and views were different. The welcome fruits were all rotten. I didn't even touch it because I thought I was going to reuse it. Communication with the lobby staff was difficult. The staff only repeats what they know, but they do not understand the guest's request.

The Check-in took forever., because the rooms are huge to turnover and guests arrive at the same time. The guard stopped to chat with driver, so doesn't see the guest arrive and does not assist the guest. Hotel staff, also did not notice until I was already 2 steps at the counter. Would not complain about this if it were a 3-star hotel, but wait they are 5-stars. So need to do better. Other than that the villas are super private with great views.

Above all, the lighting, architecture & design speaks volumes about Naka’s healthy obsession to detail.

Pros:Everything was so beautiful especially the staff they were super kind and helpful we would like to thank Jamie for being so helpful with us,the room view the facilities and the service,there was cars to take us from our room to the lobby and the other way back,amazing experience we'll definitely consider taking in our next visit.
Pros:greatest property to be honest, very nice hotel, so kind staff, I really liked my stay there and it was enjoyable, service is fast, staff are friendly, facilities are great. 10 out of 10 …!
Pros:location
Pros:1. the morning view of the sea 2. the quiet beach 3. the full lap swimming pool 4. staff friendliness n attentiveness
Pros:Good location, great staff very helpful specially miss titi at the front desk

This place is amazing! Buildings are pretty, well maintained and comfortable! The staffs are well trained and super helpful! The ambience quiet and beautiful especially during sunset time. (The hotel is slightly out of the way from hotspots, about 15 mins driving to Patong beach) The event team help me planned my wedding proposal and they gave 120% in making sure the proposal goes smoothly. The spa here is one of the best you can get too!

Pros:what can I say, one of the best experiences, the Naka would be one of my top three resorts along with Radisson bly collection hotel in rome and milan, specially the hay bay villa it was my favorite, beautiful design, amazing view, great hospitality from staff ... beat experience

Pros:The view was amazing. The way the property and rooms are designed is amazing. The private beach is amazing. The concept of the private pool villa is amazing. The reception is mind blowing. You are surely to be vowed when you arrive. The staff was pretty responsive for any service.

Pros:The view was amazing. The way the property and rooms are designed is amazing. The private beach is amazing. The concept of the private pool villa is amazing. The reception is mind blowing. You are surely to be vowed when you arrive. The staff was pretty responsive for any service.
NO GOOD VERY OLD
Pros:The place and the views are both amazing and unique.
Pros:the friendly staff the hotel landscape the design.
Pros:atmosphere the hotel staff location
Pros:In fact, staying in the naka Phuket is an experience that I will never forget. I like everything in this amazing resort. The staff are amazing especially Phi Phi from the front desk

Pros:we stayed in the high bay villa the view was amazing then we got an upgrade to the beach access villa with an amazing beach front access. breakfast in the resturant was full of options that suits everyone! last but not least I would like to thank Jamie the front desk agent for her amazing hospitality services and all the help was provided by her day by day. I literally never asked her anything and it didn’t happen! she made sure everything is done as requested in a way that exceeded our expectation!
Pros:the resort was amazingly quiet.. I liked mostly the way it’s organized
Pros:very nice property
Pros:very nice property

Pros:Excellent stay - comfort, activities, food, location, private beach etc the list goes on. A massive thank you to the staff for accommodating our requests and making our stay finally a possibility. No regrets whatsoever. Highly recommended place. Did I also mention the breathtaking views?
All staffs are very nice. Breakfast is very good Many activities at the resort

Pros:this is the best hotel i’ve ever been in! we had trouble with thaipass (covid requirement), hotel was really understanding and changed our dates at last minute, even upgraded our room because we were on our honeymoon. rooms are unbeliavable it was really big and romantic with private pool, view is perfect. staff is really helpfull, we would come back to this hotel for sure. i reccomend you to stay here and experience this for yourself.

Pros:Perfect hotel and perfect service

Pros:Staff incredible, very quick to pick you up and get you things! Very clean rooms and good cleaning staff also Views and private beach and main pool are insane, feeels so luxury and gorgeous and jungle living Replenish-able minibar in room is a lovely plus

The private beach is beautiful and the water was very clear. Although they could really improve the sunbed area by the beach as it was inadequate and could get overheating during the day. Friendly hotel staff, incredible view and decent breakfast. The air conditioning in the room was not large enough for the size of the room.
Pros:Everything was perfect and i recommend to

Pros:- Real Paradise (oh my God, beautiful views) - Excellent staff. Jamie guided us trough the whole holiday experience and was extremely helpful. She did everything to help us with pcr testing - Excellent massages - Delicious food 🤤 - Quiet private beach. Beach chairs available at any time

Pros:Mr. ToTo was amazing in facilitating everything, thank you
Pros:Everything in this hotel is just heavenly. I like this hotel and i will always come back. The prefect spot for every married couple. I strongly recommend it. The view oh my god

The atmosphere is beautiful and calm. And very relaxing, So I didn't want to go out. I spent my two days happily at the hotel. Until I felt, Why is the time passing so intense? I like it and I will go again for sure. 🥰🥰🥰
Good location, Good room, Good service, staff very nice.

Overall the hotel is very beautiful, with amazing scenery. Staffs are nice, helpful and friendly. However, sometimes the shuttle bus is very slow and have to wait for more than 10 mins (you have to take the hotel's shuttle bus to go around the hotel's property) For the villa, it is very minimal and very photogenic as well. but inside the villa is very dusty because the room is all surrounded with curtains.
